# My Mac Setup

These are instructions to setup a new Mac from scratch for my personal use.
There is better ways to automate this, but I chose to do it this way, so I can pick whichever parts I want easily.
Please see the [_archive/Software](https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B29F9AbLxAJ2c2ZjT1RvaThWRE0) for licenses and tools.

## Initial Setup

Please note that we are going to use Docker for setting up development environments.
Hence, there is no need to install different Ruby, Python, etc. versions.
Also gems and other development related packages will be added to the containers and not the local machine.

**Terminal**

```shell
xcode-select --install
# Install homebrew from http://brew.sh
ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)"

# basics
brew install git wget htop fish
brew cask install firefox google-chrome google-backup-and-sync keepingyouawake iterm2 sublime-text sublime-merge dash launchbar docker tableplus postman forklift dropbox the-unarchiver
# fonts
brew tap homebrew/cask-fonts
brew cask install font-quicksand font-andada font-fira-sans font-fira-code font-titillium-web font-ubuntu font-josefin-sans font-josefin-slab font-open-sans font-open-sans-condensed font-bebas-neue font-montserrat font-raleway font-cabin font-cabin-condensed font-lato font-pt-sans
# brew cask install font-fontawesome font-material-icons font-ionicons font-octicons font-icomoon font-foundation-icons

# keyboard layout
cd ~/Downloads && wget http://hci.rwth-aachen.de/tiki-download_wiki_attachment.php?attId=793 && unzip tiki-download_wiki_attachment.php\?attId\=793
cd USGerman\ Keyboard\ Layout\ 0.98/Roman.bundle/Contents/Resources/ && cp USGerman.keylayout USGerman.icns /Library/Keyboard\ Layouts
# Now choose U.S. German keyboard layout in Preferences - Keyboard - Input Sources - Other

ssh-keygen # or copy the key from somewhere
mkdir ~/Repositories

git config --global user.name "Tom Rothe"
git config --global user.email "info@tomrothe.de"
```

## Config files

For the home folder:

To load in iTerm:

<!-- com.googlecode.iterm2.plist: -->

**Sublime**

Please see [[201910231000]] Sublime.

**App Store**

* Window Magnet
* Things
* Tyme
* Pages, Numbers, Keynote
* Bitwarden (also install Chrome plugin)
* Tadam
* [GIF Brewery](http://gifbrewery.com/)

**Manual**

* Launchbar: deactivate indexing in Spotlight preference pane. use double control for instant send, activate Accessibility for Launchbar in Security & Privacy System Preferences), also install `Unicode.lbaction` from `_archive/Software`
* Add this custom style to Marked 2: `body, h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6, p, li, th,td, dd,dt { font-family: "Avenir Next" !important; } img { width:80%; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; }`
* Install [Sketch](http://www.sketchapp.com/) and install these plugins [Export Assets](https://github.com/geertwille/sketch-export-assets), [Measure](https://github.com/utom/sketch-measure), [iOS Icon exporter](https://github.com/tadija/aeiconizer), [Content Generator](https://github.com/timuric/Content-generator-sketch-plugin)
* Add [Shell Integration](https://www.iterm2.com/shell_integration.html) for iterm2
* Configure Google Drive
* Configure Dropbox
* Add `~/Repositories` to the Finder sidebar
* Register already installed [Things](https://culturedcode.com/things/)
